name: Taproot Alchemist
description:
Play as a gardener of root vegetables make potions with the help of your friendly cauldron.

Combine the various ingredients around the kitchen to make various potions and help the townsfolk.

Inspired by games such as Potion Craft, Doodle God, and Surgeon Simulator.

This game was made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2023. It's theme was "Roots".
